intro: Knautia heliantha, commonly known as the yellow knautia, is a flowering plant native to southern Europe. It belongs to the family Caprifoliaceae and is characterized by its showy, clustered inflorescences. The plant typically grows in meadows and rocky areas, preferring well-drained soils.
